title: Sunset Overdrive
body:
Sunset Overdrive


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Insomniac Games, Microsoft Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 25.5 GB
Repack Size: from 10.9 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors (Fixed Version)

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet] RUS/ENG Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

QuickFix for black screen after the prologue (for initial repack only)

Download this small zip and unpack to game’s assets_archive folder.
https://www3.zippyshare.com/v/yHYCr7uZ/file.html

Note – this fix should be applied only if you install the game with any language but Spanish. If you install it with Spanish or with all languages – DO NOT install it.

Updated installer will be posted after Far Cry 5 repack.

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread LATER

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Sunset.Overdrive-CODEX ISO release: codex-sunset.overdrive.iso (27,381,661,696 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with all components only!)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading of credits video and language files you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 25.5 to 10.9~16.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~30 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~1 hour on 4-threads CPU – on SSD installation is about 30% faster
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly (all resources checked only when all components are installed)
  • HDD space after installation: up to 28 GB (~31 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

Game Description

Don’t miss the single-player campaign from the game that IGN awarded Best Xbox One Game of 2014, the game that Polygon rated 9 out of 10, and the game that Eurogamer calls “a breath of fresh air.” In Sunset Overdrive, the year is 2027 and Sunset City is under siege. A contaminated energy drink has transformed most of the population into toxic mutants. For many it’s the end of the world, but for you it’s a dream come true. Your old boss? Dead. Your boring job? Gone. Transform the open-world into your tactical playground by grinding, vaulting and wall-running across the city while using a devastating, unconventional arsenal. With hyper-agility, unique weapons, and customizable special abilities, Sunset Overdrive rewrites the rules of traditional shooters and delivers an explosive, irreverent, stylish, and totally unique adventure.

Embrace the chaos of Sunset City through a hyper-colorful, post-apocalyptic single-player campaign and two bonus expansions, Mystery of Mooil Rig and Dawn of the Rise of the Fallen Machines. Outgun crazed mutants, homicidal robots, and villainous thugs on your journeys with the included Weapons Pack.

Game Features

  • An Open World with No Rules – Leap off buildings, run along walls, and grind power lines and rails to destroy your foes from every angle.
  • Over-the-top Weapons – Collect and upgrade an arsenal of unconventional weapons that use items like dynamite, fireworks, harpoons, and acid to destroy your enemies.

You can skip downloading of credits video and language files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-credits.bin
  • fg-selective-english.bin (also required for Japanese users)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-09).
